content.rendered:
Directed by Deepak Tijori.

Written by Girish Dhamija.

Cast Kajal Aggarwal(Jenny (as Kajal Agarwal)). Anil George(Srikant). Randeep Hooda(Sooraj). Snehal Kulshreshtha(Truck Owner). Lalit Kumar Malla(Fighter). Hetal Puniwala(Jignesh). Mamik Singh(Om (as Mamik)). Yuri Suri(Kevin)

Language Hindi.

Producers Siddhanta Ashdhir. Suntosh Berajdar. Dhaval Gada. Vikas Katyal. Avinaash Rai. Rajesh Shah. Dhiraj Shetty. Deepak Tijori.

Production Deepak Tijori Films. Focus Motion Pictures.
